# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environment folders
venv/
env/
.venv/

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints

# macOS files
.DS_Store

# Python logs and databases
*.log
*.sqlite3

# Streamlit cache
.streamlit/

# Environment variables
.env

# IDE files
.vscode/
.idea/

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db
